name: Kart Souls: Prepare To Ride Edition
name_original: Kart Souls: Prepare To Ride Edition
description:
The Dark Souls of kart games. Done in a Game Jam in roughly 48 hours. Trying to remember Dark Souls off the top of our heads while giving it a funny twist. Good luck with this one.

It is completely free to download and play as-is, however, if you'd like to give a shoutout to our humble work, feel free to donate when downloading it! 

Made by:

@Alberto_vgdd
